name: Spiraling Out
description:
You are a snail carrying your home on your back. What if you didn't feel right at home if that was your situation? You would probably try and do everything in your power to remedy this situation. EVERYTHING.

Spiraling Out is a narrative experience with varied gameplay sections where you'll do many different things as a snail trying to feel right at home with the thing he carries on his back. Go from small to big as you perhaps figure it all out!
